classic.name: Classic
classic.description: Score points based on category difficulty. The harder the guess, the more points you earn!
classic.rules:
Points are awarded based on the category:
• Composition: +15 points
• Composer: +10 points
• Decade: +8 points
• Era: +5 points
• Form: +3 points

Guess correctly to earn points!

buzzer.name: Buzzer
buzzer.description: Race against time and your opponents! Hit the buzzer when you know the answer.
buzzer.rules:
Categories change over time:
• 0-15s: Guess the Composition (+15 pts)
• 15-25s: Guess the Composer (+10 pts)
• 25-30s: Guess the Decade (+8 pts)

Press the buzzer to make your guess. Wrong answers cost -1 point!

bingo.name: Bingo
bingo.description: Spin the wheel to select a category, and fill your bingo card by guessing correctly!
bingo.rules: Spin the wheel to get a random category, then listen to the track and try to guess!

players.minPlayers: At least two players are required for this mode.
